text: @GregAbbott_TX This is our fight. This is our Texas. We are fearless and we will not back down. COVID-19 is the real violent offender. Get parole eligible people out of harm’s way. #SaferAtHome @GovAbbott @membergutierrez https://t.co/DwB24S1oZg
